tiralabra.heap

Interface Heap<E>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - Type of elements contained in this heap
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractHeap, MaxHeap, MinHeap

    public interface Heap<E>
    Interface for heap data structures, that provides fast access to the first element of the heap.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean add(E e)
      Add an item to the heap.
      void clear()
      Removes all the objects from this heap, the heap will be empty after this call
      boolean contains(E e)
      Check if given element is contained in the heap.
      boolean full()
      Check if the heap is full.
      void heapify(int nodeIndex)
      Check that the heap conditions are met at the index node, if they aren't fix it.
      boolean insert(E e)
      Add an item to the heap.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Check if the heap is empty.
      E peek()
      Peek at the first item of the heap without removing it
      E pop()
      Remove the first item of the heap, in max-heap the item with maximum value and in min-heap the item with the minimum value.
      void printHeap() 
      E remove()
      Remove the first item of the heap, in max-heap the item with maximum value and in min-heap the item with the minimum value.
      int size() 

    • Method Detail

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        Check if the heap is empty.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the heap is empty, otherwise false

      • insert

        boolean insert(E e)
        Add an item to the heap. Override this method in heap implementation.
        Parameters:
        e - E to be inserted
        Returns:
        true if the element was inserted into the heap

      • add

        boolean add(E e)
        Add an item to the heap. Override this method in heap implementation.
        Parameters:
        e - E to be inserted
        Returns:
        true if the element was inserted into the heap

      • remove

        E remove()
        Remove the first item of the heap, in max-heap the item with maximum value and in min-heap the item with the minimum value.
        Returns:
        First item of the heap

      • pop

        E pop()
        Remove the first item of the heap, in max-heap the item with maximum value and in min-heap the item with the minimum value.
        Returns:
        First item of the heap

      • peek

        E peek()
        Peek at the first item of the heap without removing it
        Returns:
        First item of the heap

      • heapify

        void heapify(int nodeIndex)
        Check that the heap conditions are met at the index node, if they aren't fix it. Override this method in heap implementation.
        Parameters:
        nodeIndex - The node which heap condition is to be inspected

      • size

        int size()
        Returns:
        how many elements there is currently in the heap

      • clear

        void clear()
        Removes all the objects from this heap, the heap will be empty after this call

      • full

        boolean full()
        Check if the heap is full.
        Returns:
        true if the heap is full, otherwise false.

      • contains

        boolean contains(E e)
        Check if given element is contained in the heap.
        Parameters:
        e - inspected element
        Returns:
        true if the inspected element is contained within the heap, otherwise returns false

      • printHeap

        void printHeap()
